title: Redirect > Audio Capture Inheritance not being saved in 1.77
author: boomshankerx
body_snippet:
<!--- Provide a general summary of the issue in the Title above -->

Inheritance of Redirect > Audio Capture is not saved when closing mRemoteNG
v 1.77.1.27654

## Steps to Reproduce (for bugs)
<!--- Provide an unambiguous set of steps to reproduce -->
<!--- this bug. Include code to reproduce, if relevant -->
1. Change inheritance of Redirect > Audio Capture in a folder or connection
2. Close mRemoteNG
3. Open mRemoteNG
4. Settings not preserved

iterations.description: Audio Capture Redirect inheritance flag is not persisted to XML because the property is missing from the serializer/deserializer for ConnectionInfoInheritance.

comments.snippet: Same for me - edited the XML file, even adding "inheritredirectaudiorecording=false" but same thing

AI triage (claude): Audio Capture Redirect inheritance flag is not persisted to XML because the property is missing from the serializer/deserializer for ConnectionInfoInheritance.
